title: Waste Package Monitoring UniPi Detector Metadata
description: Metadata for a waste package monitoring detector

detector_id.description: A unique identifier for the detector. Ex. 0x01_gamma_detector_UniPi

pcb_version.description: pcb version where the detector is soldered on: Ex: gamma_rad_pcb_v1

date.description: Date of the calibration procedure. Ex: 15-10-2021

calibration factor.description: Calibration factor of the detector. Ex: 4.8 cpm/uSv/h.

validity_date.description: validity date of the calibration. Ex: 15-10-2031

measuring_capability.description: The type of measurement that the detector is capable of taking.

capability.description: measuring capability of the detector. Ex: gamma radioactivity cts.

unit.description: unit of the value measured by the detector. Ex: cts
